mapper.insert: INSERT INTO DISTRICTS ( PROVINCE_ID, DISTRICT_NAME, DISTRICT_MEMO, CREATED_BY, UPDATED_BY ) VALUES ( #{provinceId}, #{districtName}, #{districtMemo}, #{createdBy}, #{updatedBy} )
mapper.select: SELECT -- 구/군 정보 A.DISTRICT_ID, A.PROVINCE_ID, A.DISTRICT_NAME, A.DISTRICT_MEMO, A.CREATED_AT, A.UPDATED_AT, A.CREATED_BY, A.UPDATED_BY, -- 등록한 사람, 수정한 사람 B.USER_NAME AS CREATED_USER_NAME, B.USER_PHONE AS CREATED_USER_PHONE, C.USER_NAME AS UPDATED_USER_NAME, C.USER_PHONE AS UPDATED_USER_PHONE, -- 시/도 정보 D.PROVINCE_NAME FROM DISTRICTS A LEFT JOIN USERS B ON B.USER_ID = A.CREATED_BY LEFT JOIN USERS C ON C.USER_ID = A.UPDATED_BY LEFT JOIN PROVINCES D ON D.PROVINCE_ID = A.PROVINCE_ID WHERE A.DISTRICT_ID = #{districtId} LIMIT 1
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM DISTRICTS WHERE DISTRICT_ID = #{districtId} LIMIT 1
